=== SCIRSC ===========================================================

This contains several helper routines, mainly for display and analysis 
of results. It can be used separately from the RigDDEs library. 

=== LIST OF DIRECTORIES ==============================================

 * pretty
 	pretty output (string formatting) and some debug helper classes
 	for easy reporting of the data from rigorous computations
 	
 * capd
 	some helper functions to operate on CAPD library, it requires
 	CAPD to use (http://capd.ii.uj.edu.pl).
